指定された場所はガレムグラード山脈の一角だった。\nここはメイズのポータル・ゼロ:
The designated location was in a corner of the Galemgrad Mountains.
This place is close to Portal Zero in Mayse.
確かにこの付近なら、風紀委員会も察知しづらいでしょうね……: It's true that it would be hard for the disciplinary committee to detect this area...
あちらさんはすでにお待ちかねらしい。: Looks like they're already waiting for us.
指示されたポイントに双頭の斧の一部隊が展開している。\nおそらく見えているだけで:
A part of the two-headed axe is deployed at the indicated point.
She probably wasn't just seeing it.
――シリウスシュガーの５機は、\n双頭の斧の機体達の前に着陸した。:
—The five Sirius Sugar machines...
I landed in front of the two-headed axe aircraft.
そっちが変な気起こさないように、こっちも一応武装はしてきた。\nこれくらいは大目:
I've armed myself to the teeth so that you don't get any weird ideas.
I wish she'd overlook this much.
……構わないわ。でもあんたは相変わらず武装しないのね。: ...I don't mind. But you're still unarmed.
設計段階から想定されてなくてな……: I wasn't expecting this from the design stage...
気が合うな、俺も心の底からそう思うよ……: We get along so well, I think so from the bottom of my heart...
まあ、いいわ。交渉を始めましょう。: Well, whatever. Let's begin the negotiations.
人質交換ではなく交渉か。\nどうやら話し合いをする気はあると思っていいようだ。:
Not a hostage exchange, but a negotiation, huh?
Looks like it's safe to assume they're willing to discuss it.
まずは龍宮ちゆると１対１で、それも直接会話をしたい。\nこの場に来ていることの確:
First, I'd like to have a one-on-one conversation with Chiyuro Ryuugu.
Including confirming that he's here.
ＭＧの通信機越しではいけませんの？: Shouldn't it be through MG's communicator?
傍受される可能性があるし、この目で姿を見ることができない。: There's a chance she'll be intercepted, and I can't see her with my own eyes.
龍宮ちゆる以外は距離を取り、機体で待機していろ。\n我々の会話を聞くことは許さな:
Everyone but Chiyuru Ryuugu, keep your distance and stay on standby.
I will not allow you to listen to our conversation.
指揮官機が示した先に生体反応がある。カメラをズームさせると、\n縄で縛られて地面:
There's a biological signal at the end of the command plane. I zoom in on the camera.
I saw Julie, bound with rope and forced to sit on the ground.
左右には合計２機の双頭の斧の下っ端の機体が、\n彼女を守るように立っている。:
To the left and right were the two-headed axe’s underlings in total
I'm standing there to protect her.
……その上でこちらからも条件がある。\n俺もふたりの会話に立ち会う。引き渡す瞬間:
...On top of that, we have a condition as well.
I'll be watching their conversation too. I can't leave them alone until the moment I hand them over.
聞き入れてくれるなら、こちらの機体の主機を落とそう。: If you're willing to listen, let's take out the main engine of this machine.
これでセンサー類の使用はできず、\n録音や通信もできない状態になる。:
Now we can't use sensors.
We won't be able to record or communicate.
――その後俺の機体とちゆる機、そしてコトハ機がそれぞれ近づき、\n停止するなりコ:
――After that, my machine, the slow-moving machine, and the Kotoha machine approached each other.
I open the cockpit hatch as soon as I stop.
そのタイミングで、俺の指示によりシリウスシュガー全機は\n主機を落として機体を停:
With that timing, at my instruction, all of Sirius Sugaru
I dropped the main engine and shut it down.
なお、この交渉に先立ち、\nジュリーは解放されて七彩機に回収されている。:
In addition, before this negotiation,
Julie had been released and recovered by the Seven Colors Machines.
こうして顔を合わせるのは初めてね。\n改めて『双頭の斧』のリーダー、コトハよ。:
This is the first time we've met like this.
I'm Kotoha, leader of the Twin-Headed Axe again.
俺は生徒会付教導指揮官の%usernameusernameuserna%だ。: I'm the student council instructor commander,_USERNAME_PLACEHOLDER_.
どちらでも。私からは龍宮ちゆるとしか呼ばないから。: Either way, I'll only call you Chiyori Ryuugu.
……そう。それにしても、先に人質を返してくれるなんて、\nどういう風の吹き回し？:
...I see. Even so, to think that she would return the hostage first...
What's going on here?
一定の信用は築いておきたいと思ったの。\n私達は別に敵じゃないことを示すために。:
I wanted to build a certain level of trust.
To show that we're not enemies.
あくまで『龍宮ちゆる』の敵じゃないってだけよ。: It's just that they're not Ryuugu Chiyuru's enemies.
私達の仲間になってほしいの、龍宮ちゆる。: I want you to join us, Ryuugu Chiyuru.
やれやれ。キミもＴ２元素応用技術が目当て？\nあれを武器に応用したいの？:
Good grief. Are you after T2 elemental application technology, too?
Do you want to apply that to your weapon?
いや、違う。あんたには研究をやめてもらう。\n未来永劫、私のそばで研究しないよう:
No, that's not it. I'll have you stop your research.
I'm going to keep an eye on you so you won't be researching by my side for the rest of your life.
Ｔ２元素応用技術は危険よ。\nあれを実用化させるわけにはいかない。:
T2 elemental application technology is dangerous.
I can't let that be put to practical use.
危険だと主張する根拠は何？: What makes you claim it's dangerous?
根拠？ むしろそれを疑問に思わない、\nあんたの脳みその方が不思議だわ。:
Base? If anything, I don't question that,
Your brain is more mysterious.
呆れたと言わんばかりにコトハの口元が歪む。: Kotoha’s lips curled into a smile, as if to say she was exasperated.
Ｔ２元素応用技術……その本質は『重力』の操作にある。: T2 elemental application technology... Its essence lies in manipulating gravity.
では、もしその技術が制御不能に陥ったら──何が起きる？: So, if that technology goes out of control, what will happen?
自明のことから話をしましょう。\nそっちの指揮官が付いてこられないみたいだし。:
Let's start with something self-evident.
It looks like the commander over there can't keep up.
メイズ内に通常の生物は長く滞在できない。: Normal creatures can't stay inside the maise for long.
そこで暮らしているのは奇妙な変異を遂げた、\n化け物のようなメイズシフターだけよ:
Living there is a strange mutation,
Only a monstrous maise shifter.
では何故そうなったのか？ それは全て――: So why did it happen? It was all—
まるで地獄の底を見てきたような瞳がちゆるを捉える。: Her eyes, as if she had seen the depths of hell itself, caught my attention.
――メイズ内の重力異常が原因。: —It’s because of the gravity abnormality inside the Mays.
そういう主張があるのは知ってるよ。\nそしてそれは……事実だろうね。:
I know there's a claim like that.
And...it's probably true.
わかっていてその態度……？ ますます信じられないんだけど。: I know that, but she's acting like that...? I can't believe it anymore.
重力操作なんてものに手を出して、\nその使い方を誤ればどうなると思う？:
I'm going to do something like manipulate gravity.
What do you think would happen if you used it the wrong way?
今はメイズ内だけで起きている現象が、\n地上にまで広がってしまうでしょうね。:
Right now, there’s a phenomenon that’s only happening within the Maze
It'll spread all the way to the surface.
そうなれば――地上全てがメイズになる。\nそうなった時、あんたは責任を取れるの？:
If that happens—the entire surface will be Mayse.
When that happens, can you take responsibility?
コトハの糾弾を受けて、明らかにちゆるは狼狽していた。: Chiyuro was clearly dismayed at Kotoha's accusation.
否定しきれないってのが本音ね。可能性の話でしかないけれど、\n彼女の言っている懸:
I can't deny it. It's just a possibility, but...
It's true that there are concerns she's talking about.
（ちゆるがこの研究の第一人者だから詳しいのはわかる。\nでもコトハがここまで未発:
(Chiyuru is a leading researcher of this research, so I understand the details.
But why is Kotoha able to talk so much about unpublished technology?)
でも……どんな技術にも危険性はある。ナイフや包丁と同じでね。: But...any technique can be dangerous. Just like knives and kitchen knives.
誰かを殺そうとその切っ先を人に向ければ武器になるし、\n食材に向ければそれは調理:
If you point the tip of it at someone to kill them, you can use it as a weapon,
If you point it at the ingredients, it's nothing more than a cooking tool.
所詮ツール――手段でしかないからね。\n大切なのは正しく扱う意志と知識を持つこと:
In the end, it's just a tool—a means to an end.
What's important is to have the will and knowledge to handle it right.
この交渉において、初めてコトハの表情が緩んだ。: For the first time in this negotiation, Kotoha’s expression relaxed.
その考え方、私は嫌いじゃない。けど――: I don't hate that way of thinking. But...
残念だけど、あんたは『誰がその刃を握るのか』を見ていない。: Unfortunately, you haven’t seen “who’s going to hold that blade”.
私達の組織の名前は――『双頭の斧』。つまりは両刃斧。\nこの名前の意味ってわかる:
Our organization's name is----The Two-Headed Axe. In other words, the double-edged Ax.
Do you know what this name means?
さあね……斧は力の象徴ってイメージくらいしかないかな。: I don't know... I can only imagine axes being a symbol of power.
そう、力の象徴。特に両刃斧の場合は常に一方の刃が敵を断つとき、\nもう一方の刃は:
That's right, a symbol of power. Especially in the case of a double-edged axe, when one of the blades always cuts the enemy off.
The other blade is pointed at me.
だからその斧を振るうには、\n己を律する強い意志と自制心がないといけない。:
So to wield that axe...
I have to have a strong will and self-control to control myself.
少しでも扱い方を間違えれば、\nその刃は簡単に自分達の脅威になってしまうから。:
If I handled it the wrong way, even a little...
That blade will easily become a threat to us.
なのに――今そんな力の象徴の柄を握ろうとしているのは、\nきっと『私達』ではない:
And yet—right now, the one trying to grasp the hilt of such a symbol of power
I'm sure it's not 'us'. This is the problem.
一体、何を言っているの……？: What in the world are you saying...?
一瞬、空を見たコトハがコックピットに飛び込む。\nそしてすぐさま機体に回避行動を:
For a moment, Kotoha looks at the sky and jumps into the cockpit.
Then, I immediately sent the aircraft into evasive maneuvers.
直後、彼女の機体のあった場所に、炎が立ち上がる。: A moment later, flames rose up where her machine had been.
少なくともシリウスシュガーには無理だ。\n全ての機体が主電源を落としていたのだか:
At the very least, that was impossible for Sirius Sugaru.
All the machines had turned off their main power, after all.
ならば双頭の斧のＭＧによるものかとなるが、\n狙ったのがコトハの機体なのは解せな:
In that case, it would have to be due to the MG of the two-headed axe, but...
I can’t understand why Kotoha’s aircraft was the target.
だとしたら可能性はひとつ。\n第三者の介入だ。:
In that case, there was only one possibility.
A third party intervened.
コックピットに飛び込んで主機を入れる。: I jump into the cockpit and put the main engine in.
離れていた七彩達も非常事態と判断したのか\nＭＧを起動させている。:
Nanaya and the others, who had been separated, must have decided it was an emergency, too
I'm activating MG.
やっぱり穏便に終わらせるのは無理だったか。: I guess it was impossible to end things peacefully after all.
少なくとも砲撃があるまではコトハと冷静な言葉のやり取りが\nできていただけに残念:
At least until there’s a bombardment, there’ll be a calm exchange of words with Kotoha
I can't help but be disappointed that I was able to do it.
双頭の斧下っ端機が発砲している。\nだが攻撃目標が定まっていないようでバラバラな:
The two-headed axe underling was firing.
However, it didn’t seem to have a fixed attack target, so it was a disorganized movement.
まずは七彩達と合流する！: I'll meet up with Nanaya and the others first!
状況は乱戦へとなだれ込んでいた。: The situation had turned into a melee.
